thread.title: DJ Black Coffee applauded for making a fan's dream come true
thread.title_full: DJ Black Coffee applauded for making a fan's dream come true

title: DJ Black Coffee applauded for making a fan's dream come true
text:
Letshego Zulu struggles financially after Gugu's death: I am a survivor but it is not easy 
The fan took to Twitter to post a video of herself performing a song at the University of Cape Town. She later messaged Black Coffee to ask him how many retweets on the video she would need before he would consider working with her. 
Black Coffee is one of the nicest guys in the industry and he responded a few minutes later by telling the fan that he would make it happen. @YozaMnyanda Let's do it.
